result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bird Xang Kong

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES 22CM940, 22CM932, & 22CM1055.  No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.   Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.   No driving without an IID installed.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 2:12 pm
INCLUDES 22CM940, 22CM932, 22CM1055
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence in person for ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Jack Mathie in person.
VRCW.  
COURT QUASHES WARRANTS.
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY.

BOND: 
$500 Signature Bond covering all files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- No driving without an IID installed.
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
Calendar Call 11/09/2022 @ 8:05 am
JT 11/10 @ 9:00 am

Branch 4 Files.

Adjourned: 2:15 pm

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:00 am.
INCLUDES: 22CM940 & 22CM932.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen for ADA Kyle Mayo. 
Defendant fails to appear. 

COURT notes mandatory appearance for today in 22CM940 ONLY; proper notice given.
IA for 22CM932 is set for 11/07/2022.
COURT ORDERS: BWA $500.00 in 22CM940 ONLY.

Adjourned: 9:00 am.
